    • Method Detail

      • pageSizeBytes

        public Options.BuilderObservable pageSizeBytes(int pageSizeBytes)
        Sets the page size in bytes. A page corresponds to a single memory mapped file. If this method is not called the default value is 1MB (1024*1024 bytes).
        Parameters:
        pageSizeBytes - the page size in bytes.
        Returns:
        this

      • scheduler

        public Options.BuilderObservable scheduler(io.reactivex.Scheduler scheduler)
        Sets the scheduler to use for reading items from files and emitting them.
        Parameters:
        scheduler - for emitting items
        Returns:
        this

      • fileFactory

        public Options.BuilderObservable fileFactory(Callable<File> fileFactory)
        Sets the file factory to be used by the queue storage mechanism. Defaults to using File.createTempFile("bufferToFileDb","") if this method is not called.
        Parameters:
        fileFactory - the factory
        Returns:
        the current builder

      • serializerJavaIO

        public <T extends Serializable> io.reactivex.functions.Function<io.reactivex.Observable<T>,io.reactivex.Flowable<T>> serializerJavaIO()
        Returns a Flowable Transformer to buffer stream items to disk (files). The serialization method uses java.io.ObjectOutputStream for writing values to disk and java.io.ObjectInputStream for reading values from disk and emitting them. Note that this is a pretty verbose serialization method for small items in that a 4 byte Integer is serialized to an 81 byte array!
        Type Parameters:
        T - stream item type
        Returns:
        FlowableTransformer using the java io serializer

      • serializerBytes

        public io.reactivex.functions.Function<io.reactivex.Observable<byte[]>,io.reactivex.Flowable<byte[]>> serializerBytes()
        Returns a Flowable Transformer that buffers items to disk (files). The serialization method passes through byte arrays directly for both writing and reading.
        Returns:
        FlowableTransformer using the bytes serializer

      • serializerUtf8

        public io.reactivex.functions.Function<io.reactivex.Observable<String>,io.reactivex.Flowable<String>> serializerUtf8()

      • serializer

        public <T> io.reactivex.functions.Function<io.reactivex.Observable<T>,io.reactivex.Flowable<T>> serializer(Serializer<T> serializer)
